item.title: Street light not working again following recent fix., 23rd April
item.description:
Street light between 10 and 12 Argyll Road is not working.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Argyll Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
